title: Triple trouble
creator_credit: Leo White, Charles Chaplin and Essanay Film Manufacturing Company
brief_description: A slapstick comedy starring Charlie Chaplin as a screwball kitchenhand who unwittingly foils Colonel W. Nutt’s scientific research and in the process involves everyone around him in a search for local train robbers. Also stars: Billy Armstrong, Albert Austin, Henry Bergman, Bud Jamison, James J. Kelley, ‘Snub’ Pollard, Edna Purviance, Wesley Ruggles and Leo White.
